{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = AmbiCom WL1100B-USB.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wave2Net IEEE 802.11b Wireless LAN USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = AmbiCom_WL1100B-USB |wikipedia = |brand = AmbiCom |model = WL1100B-USB |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded adapter |vendor_id = 0cde |device_id = 0001 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = M4Y-750 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Atmel;AT76C503A; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = [http://web.archive.org/web/20020131020402/http://www.ambicom.com/support/driverdownload/WL1100B-USB-V100.exe older version (via archive.org)] |is_manuf = No |manuf = Z-Com |manuf_model = XI-750 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/27/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The driver (available via archive.org) for this device references two USB IDs. They are as follows.. *03eb:7603 (default '''Atmel''' AT76C503A + HFA3861 ID) *0cde:0001 ('''Z-Com''' XI-750 ID) The device descriptor for both devices is '''Wireless LAN USB Adapter'''. A later version driver references only the '''0cde:0001''' ID with the device descriptor of.. *'''AmbiCom Wireless LAN USB Adapter''' This device is clearly a [[Z-Com XI-750]]. ==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.bibalex.org/web/20030110180610/www.ambicom.com/products/wave2net/wl1100b-usb.html Product page (via archive.org)]
[http://web.archive.bibalex.org/web/20040731104347/www.ambicom.com/products/wave2net/SpecsWL1100B-USB.pdf Datasheet (via archive.org)] [[Category:English Documentation]]
